key_channel_insights.line_content: Over 97% of fares matched the website, reflecting strong parity.
Over 99.9% matched the website, showing near-perfect alignment.
Over 98% aligned with the website, though GDS-higher rose 36% week over week.

conclusion.line_content: This report provides a high-level summary of the price discrepancies observed across different channels.  It is important to note that the data contains many nuances depending on various factors such as market conditions, booking windows, and the competitive landscape. Understanding these subtleties can be critical in optimizing pricing strategies and ensuring competitive positioning.

As part of our 'PriceEye' solution, we are developing an intuitive dashboard designed to help your airline's analysts drill down into this data. This tool will allow you to uncover and focus on critical actionable insights, enabling your team to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

We are here to support you in leveraging these insights to enhance your revenue management and distribution strategies. Please don't hesitate to connect with our team for more information about how PriceEye can assist you in achieving your business objectives.

ota_highlights.line_content: Over 97% matched the website; stable week over week.
Fares under 1% but rose 15% from last week, indicating mild gains.
1–2% higher fares, stable with minimal inflation.

ota_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Rose from 0.49% to 0.92%, a 40% jump in missing listings.
Held steady near 1–2%, minimal upward pressure.
Below 1%; slight uptick suggests marginal savings.

ota_summary_by_region.line_content: Around 95% same rates; OTA-higher up to 2.7% with slight declines.

ota_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 94% same fares; OTA-higher at 6% but trending down.

ota_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: 0.3% gaps; 99% alignment, strong parity on advanced bookings.

mse_highlights.line_content: Over 99.9% of fares matched the website.
Lower/higher fares each in under 0.1% of itineraries.
Price fluctuations under 0.1% weekly and monthly.

mse_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Below 0.3% missing offers, minor increases from prior weeks.
99.7% of itineraries aligned with the website.
Under 0.05% at a 25–34% premium, extremely rare.

mse_summary_by_region.line_content: 99.9% parity; no significant higher fares or MSE-lower.
Near 100% match; 0.05% MSE-higher up to a 34% premium.

gds_highlights.line_content: 1.25% of fares were higher, a 36% rise from prior week.
Under 0.1%, a 48% drop from last month.

gds_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Below 0.1% missing, down 48% from last month.
1.25% of fares, 36% above last week's level.
